title: Did these real addresses describe the death of Rush Limbo and Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi?
subtitle: In February 2012, Mima spread over media coverage of Limbo's death.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The actual headlines and jamming that were withdrawn from the news coverage of the death of Rush Limbu in February 2021 and the death of the leader of the Islamic State Group Abubakar al-Baghdadi in 2019 were used by Mimi Al-Virbi to make a point about media bias.
